name: thefreedictionary
description: A very simple filter for gratuitous advertisements and redundant social media links at this otherwise very useful online dictionary.
css:
@-moz-document domain("thefreedictionary.com"), domain("freethesaurus.com") {
/* unwanted extra website features */
main#main > div[id][class][style*="position:"],
div.slide > section[id][class~="widget"],
div.popup-holder > div.popup-block,
a.download-link,
#OccupSlider,
#browsers,
#sidebar,
#footer,
#accopy,
.header-block,
.slide-box,
/* social media related */
#fixedBlock,
.fixed-block,
.share-block,
/* anti-counter-adblock !! */
div.w2 > div > div[style*="padding:10px 10px"],
/* advertising related */
div.content-holder > section:first-child,
div#definition section:not([data-src]),
div:not([id])[style*="margin-bottom"],
div[id][style*="max-width"],
section > div:first-child,
div[id][style*="height"],
#fb,
#ad,
.adv_feedback,
.TopBannerAd,
.adsbygoogle,
.afs_ads		{ display: none !important; }

.content-holder	{ width: 80% !important; }

}
